Sentencas: An effective and facile method has been developed to manufacture anode support solid oxide fuel cells in a multimode domestic microwave oven with selective susceptors.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: Anode support substrate pellets are prepared by an uniaxial pressing method, and then a thin YSZ electrolyte film is coated by a spray coating method.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: The electrolyte thickness is kept less than 10 mu m.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: The anode supported electrolyte is co-sintered being sandwiched by two spacers and two susceptors in the microwave oven.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: A cathode is then screen-printed onto the sintered dense electrolyte film and sintered again in the microwave oven with only one spacer and one susceptor.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: The whole solid oxide fuel cell is sintered at lower temperatures compared to conventional thermal sintering temperature.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: The performance of the present solid oxide fuel cell is measured in an intermediate temperature range of 650-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering

Sentencas: The maximum power densities of 0.09, 0.12, 0.2 and 0.26 W cm(-2) are obtained at operating temperatures of 650, 700, 750 and 800 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Performance of an anode support solid oxide fuel cell manufactured by microwave sintering
